awd_abstract_narration: This proposal provides a plan for enhancing the scientific                      skills of middle school and secondary school teachers by                        combining field research experiences for teachers with a                        collaborative, professionally-guided approach to the                            development, evaluation, and assessment of curriculum based on                  the teachers' own research experience.  Eighty teachers will                    participate in project activities.  The curriculum will stress                  scientific process skills, participatory learning, classroom                    research activities, and an interdisciplinary approach to                       scientific issues.                                                                                                                                              Cost sharing is equivalent to 27% of the NSF award.
org_div_long_name: Division of Research on Learning in Formal and Informal Settings (DRL)

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA, THE
